titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on Trifloxystrobin.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/5/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2009, the duty on Methyl (E)-methoxyimino-{(E)-a-[1-(a,a,a-trifluoro-m-tolyl)ethylideneaminooxy]-o-tolyl}acetate (Trifloxystrobin).
